snippet: CHARNEY--Leon. The University of Haifa community mourns the death of Leon H. Charney, Honorary Chairman of the Board of Governors, a respected leader and loyal friend. Leon was a prominent philanthropist, lawyer, real estate developer, author, broadcaster, advisor to statesmen, and cantor. His vision in establishing the Leon H. Charney School of Marine Sciences helped catapult the University of Haifa to global prominence. Our thoughts and prayers are with his beloved wife Tzili, his children, his sister, and his extended family. Warren Gleicher, Chairman Karen L. Berman, CEO, and the Board of the American Society of the University of Haifa 1/3
